Objective: Build awareness and create a supportive environment for adolescent growth.

Training Sessions on:

1. Right to Education (RTE), Gender equality, Child rights & protection, Child Labour and Child Marriage Prevention Acts, UNCRC (UN Convention on the Rights of the Child)
2. Parents’ Meetings & Committees – Track children’s progress.
3. CSG Interface Meetings – Strengthen collaboration and follow-up.

Work Flow for Anemia Control & Health Promotion
Goal: Improve adolescent health and nutrition, especially for girls.

Key Activities:

1. Anaemia Detection Camps – Regular health checks and awareness drives.

2. Bio-Intensive Gardens (BIG) – Promote school and household gardens to boost nutrition.
